alert.note: Alert for Greater Portland Metro Area (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 4:20AM PST until March 04 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one-half inch to two inches above 1000 feet, except as low as 500 feet near the Gorge. A dusting to around an inch possible below 1000 feet. * WHERE...Greater Portland Metro Area. * WHEN...From 4 AM to noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions in the higher terrain such as the West Hills.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
